experiences.title: What will you gain from the White Desert trip?
experiences.subtitle: Things not available in any other trip‚Ä¶ because this experience is designed for you from the start.

spaceFeeling.title: Real Space Feeling
spaceFeeling.desc: A natural place that looks like another planet, without decoration, without acting, and without tourist deception.

uniquePhotos.title: Photos Unlike Anyone Else's
uniquePhotos.desc: Take photos that look like they're from outer space - because you're actually standing in a place like no other, white formations, empty spaces, and an open sky without limits - unique, non-touristy photos.

adventure.title: Live an Adventure Experience
adventure.desc: Without feeling like you're risking yourself, with a smart progression that lets you enjoy while feeling safe: equipped camp ‚Üí calculated camping ‚Üí Bedouin hotel
adventure.desc2: ‚úî An adventure with feeling‚Ä¶ without pressure or hassle.

topProgram.title: Program Number One in Its Class

whyChooseUs.title: Why is this trip different from

soulChanging.title: A soul-changing experience
soulChanging.description: The White Desert is not just a natural miracle or a trip that feels out of this world. It‚Äôs a meaningful experience ‚Äî its silence and beauty gently change something deep inside you.

smartComfort.description: Smart, comfortable planning that keeps you at ease at all times (3-star hotel ‚Äì well-equipped camping ‚Äì fully prepared camps).

uniqueMemories.description: You‚Äôll capture photos that feel like they‚Äôre from another world ‚Äî not only because we take you to the most iconic White Desert landmarks, but also because our team helps you create truly stunning shots.

bedouinSafety.description: With the Bedouins, you are safe. We take care of your comfort, and in return, you help us protect and preserve the nature reserve.

disconnect.description: You‚Äôll live among silence, stars, and fire ‚Äî completely disconnecting from the noise and chaos of city life.

aboutBedouin.title: We're not just organizers,
aboutBedouin.titleHighlight: We're the owners of the place
aboutBedouin.description: We are the Bedouins of Farafra Oasis, the people and guardians of the White Desert. We offer an experience that comes from the heart of the place itself. Camping with us is a complete life, not just accommodation, with simplicity, comfort, and real adventure in nature we respect and preserve.
aboutBedouin.quote: Our experience in the White Desert spans over 26 years, we know its roads, seasons, fluctuations, and every detail. We've executed the same programs thousands of times with people from around the world, and safety and responsibility have always been the foundation.

stats.experienceDesc2: in the Heart of the Desert

aboutBedouin.teamDescription: A professional team that understands the nature of the desert and provides an honest and warm experience. Committed to reserve laws, caring for the environment,
aboutBedouin.teamHighlight: and with any situation, we find an immediate solution.
aboutBedouin.promise: We promise you a different experience...
aboutBedouin.promiseHighlight: Not because we're selling a trip, we're sharing a part of our lives with you.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions our clients ask

firstTime.question: Is the trip suitable for me even if it's my first time in the desert?
firstTime.answer: Yes. The trip is designed for beginners going to the desert for the first time or for adventurers who have tried before. The program is gradual and equipped to let you enjoy while feeling secure, without prior experience.

comfortable.question: Are the sleeping arrangements and equipment really comfortable?
comfortable.answer: Yes. We use the best types of tents, mattresses, sleeping bags, and blankets suitable for the desert cold, keeping you warm and comfortable in the middle of the desert. With the Farafra Oasis Bedouin guarantee for immediate solutions if you need anything, the goal is for you to have the best White Desert experience while being comfortable.

bathroom.question: Is there a bathroom? Or will it be difficult?
bathroom.answer: At the Farafra camp, there's a bathroom and electricity. And in camping, there are appropriate facilities for the desert that maintain your comfort and respect for the place, not a random experience or embarrassment.

food.question: What about the food?
food.answer:
7 meals throughout the trip (3 breakfast - 2 lunch - 2 dinner):
‚Ä¢ Day 1 breakfast in Farafra (fava beans - eggs - cheese - halawa or jam - bread - hot drinks)
‚Ä¢ Day 1 light lunch at Ain Khadra (pasta with chicken - salad)
‚Ä¢ Day 1 dinner in the White Desert BBQ (grilled chicken quarter - rice - vegetables - salad - charcoal tea)
‚Ä¢ Day 2 breakfast in the desert (beans or eggs - cheese - halawa or jam)
‚Ä¢ Day 2 lunch (pasta - chicken - salad)
‚Ä¢ Day 2 dinner (Mandi chicken quarter - rice - salad)
‚Ä¢ Day 3 breakfast (feteer - honey - cheese - tahini)

hiddenCosts.question: Are there any other costs besides what's written?
hiddenCosts.answer: No. Everything is included in the price: transportation, safari, camping, hotel, food, activities, and reserve fees. All included, no hidden extra costs. The only thing you'll account for is personal expenses only or gifts.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Said About the White Desert Trip?

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Because our experience is 26 years‚Ä¶
about.subtitleHighlight: and our word is our honor
about.storySubtitle: From the original Farafra Oasis Bedouins, we offer you a real experience

features.1: We are the original Farafra Oasis Bedouins, our whole lives in the White Desert knowing its secrets, not just organizers.
features.2: Over 26 years of experience specifically in the White Desert, with precise knowledge of every path, formation, and safe camping spot in every season.
features.3: The current program has been executed over 1000 times with the same details before and succeeded with different groups.
features.4: The decision is always in the hands of a trusted guide from Farafra Bedouins, accompanying the group throughout the trip.
features.5: The team is used to dealing with different types of guests with respect for differences and each person's needs.
features.6: Trip management is built on responsibility before pleasure. If someone gets tired, the solution is immediate.
features.7: Our reputation is built on years of real execution, not a marketing campaign or promises on social media.
features.8: Full commitment to the White Desert Reserve laws to preserve safety and nature.

about.highlightSubtitle: than lose trust or ruin the experience of other guests

trips.subtitle: Choose your perfect trip and get ready for an

exitIntentPopup.whatsappMessage: Hello Saher, I saw the last chance offer and I'd like to book my spot in the White Desert trip!

items.name: Ibrahem Mohamed
items.comment: Very respectful people, educated and hardworking youth. Most importantly, they have transparency, clarity, and execute the program exactly. Top-level service, and beyond work, you feel extraordinary generosity which is not strange for the people of Farafra Oasis.... I strongly recommend UzerSaif team.

items.name: Nada Nafie
items.comment: The trip was very organized and I liked the people there, they're nice and it was a new experience. The stars in the desert are tremendously amazing, the dinner is always nice. Badawiya hotel is very clean and the prices are reasonable. The place is cozy and quiet. The hot springs are very relaxing and hot.

items.name: Cosmina Staicu
items.comment: Best people who made our first camping in the White Desert a sublime experience! Drifting, adrenaline & comfort, Milky Way, photos & videos, music, food & tea and most importantly the awesomeness of the people in the organizing team! Thank you for bringing us to the desert's moon!

items.name: Noura Kerky
items.comment: One of the best trips I've been on. They treated us with taste and politeness, very hospitable. They showed us the White Desert and Farafra with its people and artistic and agricultural culture. Want an adventure in the desert? Available. Want to walk in greenery and enjoy nature? Available. Want to feed your soul with beautiful art? Available. I wish you progress and success, thank you.

items.name: Mai Essam Kamal
items.comment: One of the best trips I've ever taken, really. May God bless you as you made us happy ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

items.name: Hana Lasheen
items.comment: I had a fantastic experience with User Saif Safari. They took care of all the details for my trip and made sure I had a great time. I highly recommend them.

items.name: Maha Yasser Arafeh
items.comment: The best people and the best organizers and trip. The people are very very very beautiful. Thank you for everything you provided.

items.name: Love Egypt
items.comment: A specialized company I traveled with and they treated us like family. Kind people by nature who love their work of serving us and providing the finest comfort tools in places you can't imagine exist.

items.name: Abdulrahman El Sobhy
items.comment: It was an outstanding experience full of activities, excitement, and entertainment. I enjoyed every single moment of the trip and would like to repeat it soon inshallah. The politeness and decency of the tour guide Mohamed El Sha3er, and the enjoyment of his leadership skills made him the perfect tour guide for the trip. Thank you very much for this amazing experience ‚ù§Ô∏è

items.name: Aya Yahia
items.comment: I really miss the trip, the time and the people, it feels like a dream ‚ù§Ô∏è Really thank you so much, I had fun and there was amazing effort so everything would be perfect ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è Especially the camping ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è Special thanks to Sha3er and Saher and everyone who worked to make it this beautiful ‚ù§Ô∏è Plus all the friends I met ‚ù§Ô∏è

white-desert-premium.title: White Desert Trip Program
gathering: First gathering: 10:30 PM ‚Äì Go Bus booking office ‚Äì Abdel Moneim Riad
Departure: 11:00 PM with a rest stop on the way
Second gathering: 11:40 PM ‚Äì Shell Out gas station (end of Hadayek Al-Ahram wall ‚Äì Menkaure Gate, Third Gate of Hadayek Al-Ahram)

day1.title: Day One ‚Äì Friday
activities: Visit the most unique cave in Egypt and the Petrified Geological Forest
Arrival at Uzersaif Camp in Farafra Oasis + authentic Egyptian breakfast
Start the 4√ó4 safari adventure
Valley of Obstacles and Moon Cave
Sandboarding experience
Light lunch at Ain Khadra
Visit the Moon Surface area
Formations tour (Mushroom, Chicken, Rabbit, Horse, Camel, Sphinx)
BBQ dinner with Bedouin marinade + stargazing night with Zarda tea

day2.title: Day Two ‚Äì Saturday
activities: Sunrise + Bedouin breakfast in the heart of the desert
Check into Bedouin hotel and rest for 3 hours
Light lunch at UzerSaif Camp
Farafra Palace and Amina House (Farafra Oasis heritage)
Oasis gardens and Roman springs (beginning of life in the oasis)
Badr Abdel Moghny Museum (international museum)
Bedouin party night
Mandi dinner with secret Bedouin marinade

day3.title: Day Three ‚Äì Sunday
activities: Visit Crystal Mountain (the most valuable mountain in Egypt)
Visit the Black Desert and volcanic mountains
Market (to buy oasis products)
Return to Cairo around 10:00 PM

food.title: Food
items: Fresh organic & healthy food, and you can ask for more
Mineral water, hot drinks and Zarda tea all day

sleep.title: Sleep
items: Camping in a place away from insects or reptiles
Sleeping bag that handles extreme cold + extra blanket

safety.title: Safety
items: A Bedouin guide with you throughout the trip
